subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jason Elam, left, kicked a 23-yard field goal in overtime to give the Broncos a 23-20 victory against the Raiders. He also kicked a field goal on the final play to give Denver a victory in its opener.
snippet: Jason Elam, left, kicked a 23-yard field goal in overtime to give the Broncos a 23-20 victory against the Raiders. He also kicked a field goal on the final play to give Denver a victory in its opener.
